channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-12741] HS2 ShutdownHookManager holds extra of Driver instance in master/branch-2.0
item.description: HIVE-12187 was meant to fix the described memory leak, however because of interaction with HIVE-12187 in branch-2.0/master, the fix fails to take effect.
item.summary: HS2 ShutdownHookManager holds extra of Driver instance in master/branch-2.0

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: daijy Can you please review this patch ?

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12779346/HIVE-12741.1.patch

ERROR: -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

ERROR: -1 due to 18 failed/errored test(s), 9963 tests executed
Failed tests:

TestHWISessionManager - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file
TestMiniTezCliDriver-schema_evol_text_nonvec_mapwork_table.q-orc_vectorization_ppd.q-vector_left_outer_join2.q-and-12-more - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestEncryptedHDFSCliDriver.testCliDriver_encryption_insert_partition_dynamic
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestNegativeCliDriver.testNegativeCliDriver_authorization_uri_import
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestNegativeCliDriver.testNegativeCliDriver_columnstats_partlvl_multiple_part_clause

org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.spark.session.TestSparkSessionManagerImpl.testSingleSessionMultipleUse

Test results: http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins/job/PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build/6468/testReport
Console output: http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins/job/PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build/6468/console
Test logs: http://ec2-174-129-184-35.compute-1.amazonaws.com/logs/PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build-6468/

Messages:

Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.TestCheckPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.PrepPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.ExecutionPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.ReportingPhase
Tests exited with: TestsFailedException: 18 tests failed

This message is automatically generated.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12779346 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build

This affects branch-1 as well. The reason for this leak is Driver.compile is nested, and we only invoke destroy once for this case:

        at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.Driver.compile(Driver.java:402)
        at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.optimizer.IndexUtils.createRootTask(IndexUtils.java:223)
